title: Whoa, not so fast!
description: This exercise’s got more sparkle than a disco ball. Stay and shine!

title: Zooming off already?
description: The fun’s just heating up—don’t miss the knowledge party!

title: Freeze, knowledge ninja!
description: You’re one step away from unlocking epic exercise secrets.

title: Hold the rocket ship!
description: There’s a galaxy of cool stuff left to explore.

title: Wait, you’re bailing?
description: Your brain’s gonna thank you for sticking around!

title: One more epic moment?
description: We’re this close to dropping some mind-blowing facts.

title: Don’t ghost us now!
description: Finish strong and be the hero of this exercise.

title: You’re so close!
description: Keep going—there’s a knowledge treasure chest waiting!

title: Eject button? Really?
description: Let’s keep this learning adventure rolling!

title: We’re pouting over here!
description: Stay a bit longer—your exercise buddy needs you!

title: Sneaking out already?
description: This session’s too awesome to leave behind!
